title: The Infinite Horizon
subtitle: Where the sky meets the water.
description: Find solace in the rhythmic sound of waves and the endless blue. These ateliers are curated for those who seek clarity and calm by the ocean.

title: Sacred Silence
subtitle: Timeless practices in modern life.
description: Step into spaces designed for reflection. From ancient temples to minimalist tea rooms, discover the art of doing nothing.

title: Earth's Texture
subtitle: Warmth from the soil.
description: Where tradition meets the earth. Discover ateliers woven with the textures of handmade paper, pottery, and aged wood.

title: Wild Elements
subtitle: Unfiltered nature.
description: For those who crave the untamed. Volcanic rock, dense forests, and the raw beauty of Korea's wild landscapes.

title: Heritage Flavors
subtitle: Stories told through taste.
description: Where every dish carries centuries of tradition. From temple cuisine to royal court recipes, discover Korea's culinary soul through intimate dining experiences.
